accounts.name: lollyMint
docs: This is the token mint that we want to burn

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority of the LollyBurnState instance

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateLollyVault
docs: LOLLY token account to burn tokens, owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: funder
docs: Lamports for rent funded from here.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: Needed to create a new account

accounts.name: lollyBurnState
docs: LollyBurnState instance to be created

accounts.name: lollyMint
docs: Mint address of the LOLLY token

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateLollyVault
docs: LOLLY token account to store LOLLY swapped from USDC of lolly_burn_state_usdc_vault using jupiter owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: usdcMint
docs: Mint address of the USDC token

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateUsdcVault
docs: USDC token account to store USDC sent from LottoGame USDC vault owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: lottoGameVault
docs: This instruction initializes the token account
required for storing this LottoGame's ticket amount collections in USDC.

accounts.name: lottoGameMint
docs: Needed for account initialization

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateUsdcVault
docs: token_in_mint to be swapped using jupiter
Mint address of the USDC token
associated_token_account of token_in_mint
USDC token account which is used to swap USDC to LOLLY using jupiter owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateLollyVault
docs: token_out_mint to be swapped using jupiter
Mint address of the LOLLY token
associated_token_account of token_out_mint
LOLLY token account to store LOLLY swapped from USDC of lolly_burn_state_usdc_vault using jupiter owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: lollyBurnStateUsdcVault
docs: LOLLY token account to burn tokens, owned by LollyBurnState PDA

accounts.name: authority
docs: We need to make sure the randomness service signed this requests so it can only be invoked by a PDA and not a user.

accounts.name: randomnessService
docs: The Solana Randomness Service program.

accounts.name: randomnessRequest
docs: The account that will be created on-chain to hold the randomness request.
Used by the off-chain oracle to pickup the request and fulfill it.

accounts.name: randomnessEscrow
docs: The TokenAccount that will store the funds for the randomness request.

accounts.name: randomnessState
docs: The randomness service's state account. Responsible for storing the
reward escrow and the cost per random byte.

accounts.name: randomnessMint
docs: The token mint to use for paying for randomness requests.

accounts.name: payer
docs: The account that will pay for the randomness request.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana System program. Used to allocate space on-chain for the randomness_request account.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The Solana Token program. Used to transfer funds to the randomness escrow.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The Solana Associated Token program. Used to create the TokenAccount for the randomness escrow.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana System program. Used to allocate space on-chain for the randomness_request account.

accounts.name: usdcMint
docs: Mint address of the USDC token

accounts.name: usdcMint
docs: Mint address of the USDC token

accounts.name: EventEmitter
docs: Tracker for event emission.

fields.name: eventId
docs: One-up, for tracking gaps in recorded program history

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed of this round/LottoGame instance.

fields.name: lottoGameVaultBump
docs: The bump seed of this round/LottoGame vault.

fields.name: version
docs: Version of LottoGame state,

fields.name: state
docs: The state of this round/LottoGame instance.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of this LottoGame instance.

fields.name: round
docs: The round number of this LottoGame instance.

fields.name: startDate
docs: The start date of this LottoGame instance.

fields.name: endDate
docs: The end date of this LottoGame instance.

fields.name: ticketPrice
docs: The price of a ticket (in USDC) for this round/LottoGame instance.

fields.name: ticketsSold
docs: The total number of tickets sold for this round/LottoGame instance.

fields.name: lottoGameMint
docs: The mint used for ticket sales (in USDC).

fields.name: lottoGameVault
docs: The vault where the USDC ticket sales are stored.

fields.name: jackpotWinningTicket
docs: The winning ticket of this round/LottoGame instance.

fields.name: maxNumbersInTicket
docs: The maximum numbers in a ticket for this round/LottoGame instance (e.g. 0-9).
Ticket has only 6 numbers. But the last two bytes are reserved for padding.

fields.name: jackpotWinningNumbers
docs: The jackpot winning numbers of this round/LottoGame instance.
7th byte is indication if the winning numbers are set. 0 = not set, 1 = set.
8th byte is an indication if jackpot_winning_amount is disbursed or not (0 = not disbursed, 1 = disbursed).

fields.name: tier1WinningNumbers
docs: The tier 1 winning numbers of this round/LottoGame instance.
7th byte is indication if the winning numbers are set. 0 = not set, 1 = set. 8th byte is padding.

fields.name: tier2WinningNumbers
docs: The tier 2 winning numbers of this round/LottoGame instance.
7th byte is indication if the winning numbers are set. 0 = not set, 1 = set. 8th byte is padding.

fields.name: tier3WinningNumbers
docs: The tier 3 winning numbers of this round/LottoGame instance.
7th byte is indication if the winning numbers are set. 0 = not set, 1 = set. 8th byte is padding.

accounts.name: LottoGameVault
docs: Does not need to be initialized, only to act as a signer.
This signer owns the USDC token account where ticket sales in USDC is stored.

fields.name: user
docs: The user who bought this ticket.

fields.name: ticketNumber
docs: The ticket number of this ticket for the current lotto_game.

fields.name: lottoGame
docs: The LottoGame instance this ticket is associated with.

fields.name: round
docs: The round number of the LottoGame instance this ticket is associated with.

fields.name: numbers
docs: The numbers the user has chosen for this ticket.

fields.name: ticketPrice
docs: The price of this ticket in USDC.

fields.name: buyDate
docs: The date this ticket was bought.

fields.name: checkDate
docs: The date this ticket was checked for winning numbers.

fields.name: isChecked
docs: A flag to indicate if this ticket has been checked for winning numbers.

fields.name: isDuplicated
docs: A flag to indicate number of times the numbers have been duplicated.

fields.name: isWinner
docs: A flag to indicate if this ticket is the winning ticket of the round.

fields.name: prize
docs: The amount the user has been paid for this ticket if this is the winning ticket.

types.name: BurnLollyEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user burns $LOLLY tokens.

types.name: CloseEventEmitterEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user closes EventEmitter state.

types.name: CloseLollyBurnStateEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user closes a LollyBurnState.

types.name: CreateLollyBurnStateEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user creates a lolly burn state.

types.name: CreateLollysLottoEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user creates a lolly lotto.

types.name: StartLottoGameEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user starts a lotto game.

types.name: SwapUsdcLollyEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user swaps USDC for lolly.

types.name: CrankLottoGameClosedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user updates a lotto game.

types.name: ProcessWinningNumbersEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user consumes randomness.
This is a placeholder event, and will be replaced with a more
meaningful event in the future.

types.name: DuplicateWinningNumbersEvent
docs: Event emitted when duplicate winning numbers are detected.

types.name: RequestWinningNumbersEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user requests randomness.

types.name: TestEmitWinningNumbersEvent
docs: Test Event emitted when a user requests randomness.

types.name: BuyLottoTicketEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user buys a lotto ticket.

types.name: CreateUserMetadataEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user creates user metadata.

types.name: CrankLottoGameWinnersEvent
docs: Event emitted when a admin cranks a lotto game winner.

types.name: CrankTransferWinningAmountToUserRewardsVaultEvent
docs: Event emitted when admin crank transfers winning amount to user rewards vault.

types.name: LottoGameWinningNumbers
docs: Compile-time size check.

types.name: RandomnessRequestError
docs: Custom error code: 7100 + idx => 0x17D4 + 0x${idx}

types.name: ProgramInstruction
docs: Used to decode the type of instruction that occurred, you can decode
this from a historical transaction's raw instruction data.

types.name: LollysLottoProgramEventData
docs: The inner data of an [LollysLottoProgramEvent]

errors.name: JupiterIxSourceTokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: [L101] Source token account of jupiter ix mismatch

errors.name: JupiterIxDestinationTokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: [L102] Destination token account of jupiter ix mismatch

errors.name: OnlyLOLLYBuringAllowed
errors.msg: [L103] Only $LOLLY tokens are allowed to burn!

errors.name: OnlySwapToLOLLYAllowed
errors.msg: [L105] Only Swap to $LOLLY tokens are allowed

errors.name: OnlySwapFromUSDCAllowed
errors.msg: [L106] Only Swap from $USDC tokens are allowed

errors.name: RoundNumbersAreSequential
errors.msg: [L113] Round numbers have to be sequential

errors.name: NoRewardsToClaimFromVault
errors.msg: [L116] No rewards to claim from vault

errors.name: LottoGameVaultNotEmpty
errors.msg: [L118] Lotto Game vault is not empty

errors.name: WinningNumberIndexIsNotProvided
errors.msg: [L121] Winning number index is not provided
